description:
Ever wanted to make an App? Now you can for free.

Iâ€™m Gareth Ffoulkes from One Dreamer and my goal is to help aspiring and indie developers enter and thrive in the mobile app industry.

With this course, you get the full source code of 'Cute Rush' an addictive and successful game in the App store. Cute Rush includes many important features such as Game Center, Facebook/Twitter integration and In-app ratings. You also get the One Dreamer Editor to help you on your app development journey.

In this course I walk you through the process of setting up your developer account, reskinning the source code and launching your app to the Appstore. Not a single line of code is required.

You have full access to the well-documented source code and a free license to submit to the App store. Any revenue you make off your app is completely yours. Any modification or customisation is entirely up to you.

This is a perfect way to start your mobile development career and this is a must have for anyone wanting to add another successful app to their portfolio.

I hope you enjoy the course. Keep dreaming apps.
title: Launch an App in 40 Minutes
